dict.acceptation: 使大为吃惊，使惊奇( amaze的现在分词)；使惊异：感到非常好奇；

sent.orig: But unfortunately my amazing hair style had scared away a lot of amazing girls.
sent.trans: 但很不幸，我“出色”的发型吓跑了很多“出色”的姑娘。

sent.orig: If everything is outstanding, if everything is the amazing thing ever, is anything amazing at all?
sent.trans: 如果一切都成出类拔萃，如果事事都是令人无比诧异，那还有无令人诧异一说呢？

sent.orig: B Yes, it was amazing. At least I thought the first half was amazing.
sent.trans: B是的，令人惊叹。至少我认为上半场非常精彩。

sent.orig: Yes, amazing. At least I thought the first half amazing.
sent.trans: 是的，令人惊叹。至少我以为上半场非常精彩。

sent.orig: Abigail: Fantastic. I heard a couple of the tracks on the radio yesterday. They were amazing.
sent.trans: 艾比盖尔：好啊。我昨天在收音机上听到其中几首歌，非常好听。
